document_data.name: Kaleil
document_data.mainbody: '''Kaleil''' was a [[druid]] of [[Maiden's Glade]] near the [[Mere of Dead Men]] on the [[Sword Coast North]].
document_data.History: In {{YearlinkName|1374}}, Kaleil and the animals dwelling in Maiden's Glade were corrupted and driven mad by a sinister presence in the Mere of Dead Men. He [[shapechange]]d himself into a [[bear]], but was not able to change back. Traveling with the druid [[Elanee]], the [[Kalach-Cha]] encountered Kaleil in Maiden's Glade and had no choice but to kill him.
